devdoc.details: This contract is used for initializing and deploying housing projects. It allows the deployment of a new housing project and manages project data.

ProjectDeployed(address).details: Emitted when a new project is deployed.

params.projectAddress: Address of the newly deployed HousingProject contract.

allProjects().details: Returns an array of all project IDs and their associated data.

returns._0: projectList An array of tuples containing project details.

claimProjectTokens(uint256).details: Claims project tokens for a given project ID.

params.projectId: The ID of the project to claim tokens from.

params._coinbase: Address authorized to initialize the first project.

deployProject(string,string,address,uint.details: Deploys a new project. This function can be called multiple times to deploy additional projects.

params.fundingDeadline: The deadline for the project funding.
params.fundingGoal: The funding goal for the new project.
params.fundingToken: Address of the ERC20 token used for funding.

getProjectAddress(uint256).details: Returns the address of the HousingProject contract for a given project ID.

returns.projectAddress: The address of the HousingProject contract.

getProjectData(uint256).details: Returns the details of a project by its ID.

returns.fundingDeadline: The deadline for the project funding.
returns.fundingGoal: The funding goal of the project.
returns.fundingToken: The address of the ERC20 token used for funding.
returns.projectAddress: The address of the HousingProject contract.
returns.status: The funding status of the project.

initFirstProject((address,uint256),strin.details: Initializes the first project. This function must be called by the coinbase address and can only be called once. It sets up the token and deploys the first project.

params.fundingDeadline: The deadline for the project funding.
params.fundingGoal: The funding goal for the new project.
params.fundingToken: Address of the ERC20 token used for funding.
params.shtPayment: Payment details for the Smart Housing Token (SHT).
params.smartHousingAddress_: Address of the Smart Housing contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: ProjectFunding
